    • Constructor Detail

      • SetBase

        public SetBase(java.lang.String table,
               java.lang.String key,
               Type Default,
               boolean setPersistance)
        SetBase can share data of type Type with other devices such as the driver Station laptop through the NetworkTables Class without restrictions when peersistence is false. Set can share data of type Type with other devices such as the driver Station laptop through the NetworkTables Class with restrictions when peersistence is true. The SetBase values are persistant. They can be changed in OnlineViewer or custom programs and will remain set to the new values when the code is rebooted. SetBase values cannot be modified when Hard Code is set (true). Hard code values are used instead.
        Parameters:
        table - table identifies the subtable name of the master robot tabele neme specified in class cpi.tools.Constants.TITLE . eg. If Constants.TITLE = "Robot" and table = "Name1", the full table path name is "Robot/Name1" Slashes(/) may be used to define tables of subtables.
        key - key is the final key identifier of type Type. Do not use / (slash) as part of key
        Default - Default is the initial value of the set parameter with type Type.
        setPersistance - setPersistance determines if persistence is enabled. setPersistance is true for the class Set and false for the Net class

    • Method Detail

      • Value

        public Type Value()
        Returns:
        Returns the current value if persistence is false. Returns the current value if persistence is true and Hard Code is false. Returns the Hard Code value if persistence is true and Hard Code is true. Hard Code state may only be modified outside the robot program.

      • Value

        public Type Value(Type value)
        Parameters:
        value - The new programmed value if persistence is false or if persistence is true and Hard Code is false. If persistence is true and Hard Code is true the internal value is not changed.
        Returns:
        Returns the current value if persistence is false. Returns the current value if persistence is true and Hard Code is false. Returns the Hard Code value if persistence is true and Hard Code is true. Hard Code state may only be modified outside the robot program.

      • Lock

        public void Lock(boolean setLocked)
        Parameters:
        setLocked - Prevents changing the value outside the robot program

      • tempUnLock

        public void tempUnLock()
        Allows values to be changed without conditions once for each tempUnLock.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.tables.ITableListener listener)
        Adds a table and key listener to the setting. Listeners are invoked (run) when the value changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - An example of listener code ITableListener listener=new ITableListener(){ public void valueChanged(ITable Table, String str, Object obj, boolean bool){ isHardCode=(boolean)obj; } };

      • addHCListener

        public void addHCListener(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.tables.ITableListener listener)
        Adds a Hard Code State listener to the Hard Code state table and key. Listeners are invoked (run) when the value changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - An example of listener code ITableListener listener=new ITableListener(){ public void valueChanged(ITable Table, String str, Object obj, boolean bool){ isHardCode=(boolean)obj; } };

      • lineNumber

        public static int lineNumber()
        Used for debug
        Returns:
        Returns the current line number when invoked.
